Content.Text:
Today is <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>'s birthday!
Let's make their favorite foods and throw them a
party!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooooh, yay! Look at all the yummy food today!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! All of these are my faaaavorite! ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Thanks, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>I love you guys lots and lots!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Me too! I love Mama and Papa lots and lots and
lots!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmmm! I'm super full!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Ahhh! I love eating as much as I want of my
favoritest foods. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for the birthday party, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! We love you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmmm! <PARENT>'s food is so yummy, I ate it
all. Now my tummy feels like a big ball.
<PAGE>
Hey, wouldn't it be great if every day was our
birthday? That would be the best!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Heehee! Thanks for throwing a birthday party for
us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! You're the best Mama and Papa ever!

Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>!
It's so wonderful to see you grow bigger and
stronger every year!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>!
Dig in and eat as much as you want! The more
you eat, the mightier you become, y'know. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Haha. Let's have another family birthday party
just like this next year. Deal? Deal!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M>. Happy birthday,
<CHILD_NAME_W>. You're both growing so big and
strong.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Papa and Mama love you both very much. Let's
have another birthday party just like this next
year, shall we?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>.
Eat up, okay? I like cookin' for you guys because
you like just about everything I make.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's have another party like this again next year,
'kay? Actually...let's make it an even better party!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M>. Happy birthday,
<CHILD_NAME_W>. You're both growing so much every
year. You make your Papa proud.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'd love to have another party just like this again
next year, together as a family.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>.
Eat up, so you can grow up big like Papa and
Mama.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Y'know, let's do this again next year -- a birthday
party with just the four of us. How's that sound?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>!
Look at how big you guys are gettin'!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Your Papa and Mama love you both. You wanna
have another party like this next year, just the
four of us? Let's do it!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, my dear <CHILD_NAME_M> and
<CHILD_NAME_W>. You're both growing up so quickly!
Keep being a good brother and sister, okay?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohoho! Both your Mama and your Papa love you
very much. Let us have another party just like
this one again next year, shall we?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>.
Goodness, you've both gotten so big! It's like
you're growing faster than my latest book.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's have another family party like this again
next year, shall we? I know I'd love to.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Haaaaappy birthdaaaaay, <CHILD_NAME_M> and
<CHILD_NAME_W>! It's your day, with all your favorite
foods, so eat eeeeverything! Num num num!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mama and Papa love you both a whole bunch!
We're definitely going to have another party like
this again next year, just the four of us!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>.
♪ You're both growing so big and strong, just
like little bear cubs!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! We have to have another party just
like this again next year. Or better yet...a party
that's even MORE fun! ♪

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>. I'm
glad to see you've had another year of healthy
growth.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Your Mama and Papa love both of you very
much. Next year, we'll have another party, one
even better than this year's.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeeey, happy birthday <CHILD_NAME_M> and
<CHILD_NAME_W>. You've both grown so big. I hope
you always get along this well, haha!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like parties like this, with just the four of us.
Let's have another one next year, okay?
